name: Combo Quest (itch)
description:
Combo quest is a game where you control a wizard with the power of weapon forgery.

Kill enemies to make them drop an element which you can then combine with another element to create a unique weapon that's much more effective than your basic attack.

  • 50+ weapon combinations
  • Randomly generated dungeons
  • Five different enemy types

Feedback is appreciated!

Music by Lundqvistbro
